title: I want to transfer all data from my pixel 2xl (touchscreen does not work on it) to my pixel 3.
content: My pixel 2xl crashed and half of the touchscreen stopped working. And I can't unlock my phone and make a backup or drop all the data on the cable because of this. I know the password for the phone, but I cannot enter. I want you to help unlock your pixel 2 xl remotely to transfer all data to a new phone.
